name: AVAssetDownloadStorageManager
desc: An object that manages policies to automatically purge downloaded assets.

items.name: class func shared() -> AVAssetDownloadStorageManager
items.desc: Returns the shared storage manager instance.

items.name: func storageManagementPolicy(for: URL) -> AVAssetDownloadStorageManagementPolicy?
items.desc: Returns the storage management policy for a downloaded asset.

items.name: func setStorageManagementPolicy(AVAssetDownloadStorageManagementPolicy, for: URL)
items.desc: Sets a storage policy for the downloaded asset.
